comment.author: 39312862@N00
comment._content: The person who wrote the original caption used the wrong common name. Pink Milk Wort is Polygala incarnata. The plant pictured is a Texas Thistle, Cirsium texanum.

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content: Eric in SF, Thanks for sharing this information with us. Since the original caption is part of the archival record, we won't be able to make a change to that, but we can pass this information along to the still picture archivists to see if they would include it as a general note in the online catalog (the Archival Research Catalog or ARC www.archives.gov/research/arc/) description. - Jill (U.S. National Archives)

comment.author: 39312862@N00
comment._content: Awesome, that's what I expected would happen, thanks!
